013    package net.sf.oval.constraint;
014    
015    import static net.sf.oval.Validator.getCollectionFactory;
016    
017    import java.util.Map;
018    
019    import net.sf.oval.Validator;
020    import net.sf.oval.configuration.annotation.AbstractAnnotationCheck;
021    import net.sf.oval.context.OValContext;
022    import net.sf.oval.internal.util.StringUtils;
023    
024    /**
025     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
026     */
027    public class InstanceOfAnyCheck extends AbstractAnnotationCheck<InstanceOfAny>
028    {
029            private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
030    
031            private Class< ? >[] types;
032    
033            /**
034             * {@inheritDoc}
035             */
036            @Override
037            public void configure(final InstanceOfAny constraintAnnotation)
038            {
039                    super.configure(constraintAnnotation);
040                    setTypes(constraintAnnotation.value());
041            }
042    
043            /**
044             * @return the type
045             */
046            public Class< ? >[] getTypes()
047            {
048                    return types;
049            }
050    
051            /**
052             * {@inheritDoc}
053             */
054            public boolean isSatisfied(final Object validatedObject, final Object valueToValidate, final OValContext context,
055                            final Validator validator)
056            {
057                    if (valueToValidate == null) return true;
058    
059                    for (final Class< ? > type : types)
060                    {
061                            if (type.isInstance(valueToValidate)) return true;
062                    }
063                    return false;
064            }
065    
066            /**
067             * @param types the types to set
068             */
069            public void setTypes(final Class< ? >... types)
070            {
071                    this.types = types;
072                    requireMessageVariablesRecreation();
073            }
074    
075            /**
076             * {@inheritDoc}
077             */
078            @Override
079            public Map<String, String> createMessageVariables()
080            {
081                    final Map<String, String> messageVariables = getCollectionFactory().createMap(2);
082                    if (types.length == 1)
083                    {
084                            messageVariables.put("types", types[0].getName());
085                    }
086                    else
087                    {
088                            final String[] classNames = new String[types.length];
089                            for (int i = 0, l = classNames.length; i < l; i++)
090                            {
091                                    classNames[i] = types[i].getName();
092                            }
093                            messageVariables.put("types", StringUtils.implode(classNames, ","));
094                    }
095                    return messageVariables;
096            }
097    }
